alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 12:11PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dodge, west central Telfair and Wilcox Counties through 1245 PM EST... At 1210 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Owensboro, or 9 miles southwest of Abbeville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Rochelle, Milan, Rhine, Chauncey, Pitts, Union, Antioch Church, Temperance, Browning, Five Points, Owensboro and Godwinsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
